concept.title: Conversion Success Metric
concept.shortdesc: The conversion success metric control allows you to change the success metrics you aggregate your reports on.

conbody.p: It only appears when you have added multiple success metrics to your campaign. If more than one success metric in your campaign contains order or conversion information, you can select all of these success metrics in order for the report data to aggregate all of the conversion and order information from all of the selected success metrics.
To select multiple success metrics, shift-click on each success metric in the list. then click Show to refresh the report.
